metadata.title: Professional Team Photos in 60 Seconds
metadata.description: Turn any selfie into consistent, on-brand headshots. No photographer, no coordination. Professional AI headshots for your entire team.

hero.subtitle: You set the brand essentials (e.g. logo, clothing style, backgrounds). Your team picks the rest (e.g. colors and poses). Everyone looks unified yet personal. Professional headshots from any selfie in 60 seconds,
hero.subtitleBold: no photographer or scheduling drama required.
hero.subtitleMain: Turn any selfie into consistent, on-brand headshots. No photographer, no coordination.

hero.finalCtaSubtitle: Get your team's professional headshots and see the difference in 60 seconds.

gallery.title: From 'meh' selfies to LinkedIn-worthy headshots
gallery.subtitle: See how we transform ordinary photos into professional headshots that actually impress clients and recruiters. No fancy camera or photographer required.

trust.title: Why teams choose TeamShotsPro over everyone else
trust.subtitle: Built for serious B2B teams that need enterprise-grade photo management, not consumer gimmicks

teamCommandCenter.title: Team Command Center - Built for managers who hate chaos
teamCommandCenter.description: Central dashboard where you control everything: approve photos, invite team members with one click, track progress, and manage brand consistency across your entire organization. Unlike consumer tools, this was built specifically for teams.

industryTemplates.title: Professional templates designed for your industry
industryTemplates.description: Pre-built style templates for tech startups, consulting firms, creative agencies, healthcare, finance, and more. Each template understands the professional standards for your industry - from conservative banking styles to creative agency vibes. Not generic filters.

qualityControl.title: Quality guaranteed with automatic fixes
qualityControl.description: Photos that fail our quality standards get regenerated automatically. Plus you get plan-based free retries to perfect your results. Unlike other services where you pay for every attempt, we handle quality issues automatically and give you free iterations to get exactly what you want.

howItWorks.title: From team photo chaos to 'done' in 5 minutes
howItWorks.subtitle: Stop wasting weeks coordinating photoshoots. Here's exactly how modern teams get professional headshots instantly.
howItWorks.cta: Get your team's professional headshots now
howItWorks.guarantee: Risk-free: Get your team's professional headshots to prove it works. No credit card, no commitment, no BS.

1.title: Set your brand style
1.description: Choose background and upload logo in 30 seconds.

2.title: Invite your team
2.description: Send personalized links. Each person uploads their selfie from any device.

3.title: Professional photos in 60 seconds
3.description: Get polished headshots instantly. No editing required.

4.description: See all results in one dashboard. Retry anything you want to improve.

5.title: Download headshots

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about TeamShotsPro
faq.noResults: No questions found matching your search.

1.question: Is my data secure and private?
1.answer: Absolutely. We use enterprise-grade encryption and never store your photos permanently. Your photos are automatically deleted within 30 days after account closure, or you can request deletion anytime. We don't share your data with third parties-not even your boss, we promise.

2.question: How much does it cost?
2.answer: When you sign up, you get a free test generation with TeamShotsPro branding so you can see the quality. After that: Individual plan at {individualPrice} ({individualPhotos} photos), Pro Small at {proSmallPrice} ({proSmallPhotos} photos for teams up to 5), or Pro Large at {proLargePrice} ({proLargePhotos} photos for larger teams). Photo credits never expire, so you can hoard them like digital gold. Each generation uses 1 photo credit and produces up to {maxVariations} variations.
2.answerTeam: When you sign up, you get a free test generation with TeamShotsPro branding so you can see the quality. After that: Pro Small at {proSmallPrice} ({proSmallPhotos} photos for teams up to 5), or Pro Large at {proLargePrice} ({proLargePhotos} photos for larger teams). Photo credits never expire, so you can hoard them like digital gold. Each generation uses 1 photo credit and produces up to {maxVariations} variations.
2.answerIndividual: When you sign up, you get a free test generation with PhotoShotsPro branding so you can see the quality. After that: Individual plan at {individualPrice} ({individualPhotos} photos). Photo credits never expire, so you can hoard them like digital gold. Each generation uses 1 photo credit and produces up to {maxVariations} variations.

3.question: What types of photos work best?
3.answer: Any clear photo of your face works! Selfies and casual photos work great. The better quality your selfie, the better quality your result. The less we need to guess, the better.

4.question: Can I use these photos for my LinkedIn, website, etc.?
4.answer: Yes! All generated photos are yours to use for any professional purpose - LinkedIn, company websites, business cards, presentations, and more. You receive high-resolution files (1024x1024px) perfect for any professional use. Go ahead, look amazing everywhere.

5.question: How does the photo generation work?
5.answer: Our system analyzes your uploaded photo and creates professional headshots by applying polished photography styles. You'll still look like you, just more professional and polished. See the gallery above for real examples.

6.question: How many photos do I get per generation?
6.answer: Each generation produces 4 different professional variations of your photo. You can download all of them and choose your favorites. This gives you options for different contexts or preferences-serious LinkedIn, friendly website, you get the idea.

7.question: Do you support team photos or just individual headshots?
7.answer: Currently, we focus on individual professional headshots. Each person needs to upload their own photo for the best results (but hey, at least they don't all need to be in the same room). We're working on team photo capabilities for future updates, because group shots are hard.

freeGen.question: Do I get a free generation?
freeGen.answer: Yes! We give new users one free test generation in a set style so you can see if our AI lives up to the hype. It normally costs 1 photo credit and lets you retry up to 4 times (depending on your package).

howCreditsWork.question: How do photo credits work?
howCreditsWork.answer: Each photo generation uses 1 photo credit and allows up to 4 high-quality variations depending on your plan. Your photo credits never expire. No rush, they're yours to keep!

topUp.question: Can I top up photo credits?
topUp.answer: Yes! You can purchase additional photo credits at any time. Pricing varies by tier.

satisfaction.question: What if I'm not satisfied?
satisfaction.answer: Every photo can be generated 2-4 times with small variations, depending on your plan (free plan: 1 retry, Individual and Pro Small: 2 retries, Pro Large: 3 retries). We offer a free test generation in a predefined style when you sign up. Try it first, no obligations.
satisfaction.answerTeam: Every photo can be generated 2-4 times with small variations, depending on your plan (free plan: 1 retry, Pro Small: 2 retries, Pro Large: 3 retries). We offer a free test generation in a predefined style when you sign up. Try it first, no obligations.
satisfaction.answerIndividual: Every photo can be generated 2-3 times with small variations, depending on your plan (free plan: 1 retry, Individual: 2 retries). We offer a free test generation in a predefined style when you sign up. Try it first, no obligations.

welcomeContent.organizer: Welcome to TeamShotsPro. Transform your team's casual selfies into polished professional headshots in under 60 seconds. Enhance your company's professional presence without the need for photoshoots.
welcomeContent.individual: Welcome to TeamShotsPro. Transform your casual selfie into polished professional headshots in under 60 seconds. Elevate your LinkedIn profiles, portfolios, and personal brand.
welcomeContent.invited: Welcome to TeamShotsPro. Your team is creating consistent professional photos, and you are part of it. Upload your selfie to match your team's style and receive your headshots in under 60 seconds.

transformationContent.organizer: Observe the transformation: We convert everyday selfies into professional headshots that command attention. Pro tip: Use natural lighting and frame from the chest up for optimal results.
transformationContent.individual: Observe the transformation: We convert your casual selfie into a standout professional headshot. Ideal for LinkedIn, portfolios, and professional networking. Pro tip: Use natural lighting and frame from the chest up for optimal results.
transformationContent.invited: Observe the transformation: We convert your selfie into a professional headshot that aligns with your team's style. This ensures consistent visuals while highlighting your unique professional presence.

mainOnboarding.welcomeContent:
Welcome to TeamShotsPro! Transform casual selfies into polished professional headshots that command attention and build credibility.

Join thousands of professionals who've already elevated their presence. Built on secure infrastructure designed for HR and talent teams.
mainOnboarding.roleSelectionContent: Are you setting this up for your company, building a team style, or just looking to upgrade your personal brand? You're in good company of people teams who care about presentation and fairness. Let's get you started on the right path.
mainOnboarding.wowMomentContent:
Watch as we turn casual snapshots into professional headshots. Teams using consistent professional photos see 40% higher engagement on company profiles.

Here's a pro tip: Use natural lighting and frame from the chest up for best results.

[Interactive before/after demo would go here]
mainOnboarding.outcomeSelectionTitle: What success looks like for you
mainOnboarding.outcomeSelectionContent: Whether it's standardized photos for your applicant tracking system, consistent branding for your About page, or that perfect LinkedIn upgrade ‚Äì we've got you covered. Teams like yours usually start with consistent branding across all profiles.
mainOnboarding.firstActionContent:
Let's start with uploading your first selfie. We're currently processing a limited number of new teams per day to maintain our quality standards.

Over 4,000 professional photos generated this week.

welcome.title: Welcome to TeamShotsPro, {Firstname}!
welcome.content:
Thanks for choosing TeamShotsPro. You're awesome! üöÄ

You'll look impeccably professional before your coffee goes cold.
welcome.photoStylesContent: Before generating photos, you can customize your photo styles here. Choose backgrounds, clothing, expressions, and more to create your perfect professional look.
welcome.generateButton: Click here to transform your selfie into professional headshots that elevate your presence. Your future self will thank you.

teamAdminWelcome.title: Welcome to TeamShotsPro, {Firstname}!
teamAdminWelcome.content:
Thanks for choosing TeamShotsPro. You're awesome! üöÄ

Ready to transform your entire team into a cohesive group of polished professionals? Everyone will look consistently excellent before you finish your coffee break.
teamAdminWelcome.teamButton: Click here to create your team and begin the transformation.
teamAdminWelcome.teamNameContent: Enter your team name here to get started. This will be used to identify your team throughout TeamShotsPro.

generationTour.uploadContent: Drop your selfie here and witness the transformation. We turn casual snapshots into headshots that make you shine like a LinkedIn legend.
generationTour.styleContent: Personal photos for your professional image, or team photos if you want to coordinate your team's visual consistency.
generationTour.photosContent: Each generation costs 1 photo. Trust us, you'll want to use them all once you see how impressive you look.
generationTour.generateContent: Click here to begin your transformation. Your professional headshots will be ready before you can say 'cheese.'

teamSetupTour.createContent: Set up your team here and prepare to transform your entire group into a team of polished professionals. This takes seconds, the results last forever.
teamSetupTour.styleContent: Define your team's signature look here. Ensure everyone shines consistently - no more inconsistent photos in company profiles.
teamSetupTour.inviteContent: Bring your team on board so they can begin their professional transformation. They'll thank you when they look this impressive.

teamPhotoStyleSetupTour.title: Set up your team photo styles
teamPhotoStyleSetupTour.content: Create your team's signature look here. Ensure everyone shines consistently - because your brand deserves to look as impressive as your team.

teamPhotoStylesPageTour.headingContent: A team photo style is a preset that ensures all your team members' photos look consistent and professional. It defines backgrounds, clothing, expressions, and branding so everyone matches your brand identity perfectly. Create and manage your team's signature looks here.
teamPhotoStylesPageTour.createContent: Click here to craft custom photo styles that make your team look like the professionals they are. Backgrounds, branding, clothing - you control it all.

teamPhotoStylesFreeTour.headingContent: A team photo style is a preset that ensures all your team members' photos look consistent and professional. It defines backgrounds, clothing, expressions, and branding so everyone matches your brand identity perfectly. Even on the free plan, everyone gets to shine consistently and professionally.
teamPhotoStylesFreeTour.freeContent: Kickstart your team's journey with our Free Package style, perfect for testing the service! Most settings are locked, but each user can customize their wardrobe colors. (Who doesn't love a good teaser?) Upgrade to unlock full custom team styles.
teamPhotoStylesFreeTour.backgroundContent: We've got a professional background ready for your team's photos, consistent and sharp!
teamPhotoStylesFreeTour.brandingContent: Your team photos feature the TeamShotsPro logo for that extra touch of consistency (we promise it's tasteful).
teamPhotoStylesFreeTour.shotTypeContent: Set to 3/4 view, because who doesn't look great from this angle?
teamPhotoStylesFreeTour.clothingTypeContent: Business casual vibe ensures everyone looks professional yet approachable, the perfect balance!
teamPhotoStylesFreeTour.clothingColorsContent: Here's where you shine: Each team member can pick their own wardrobe colors while keeping everything consistent. Mix it up!
teamPhotoStylesFreeTour.expressionContent: Confident expressions all around, helping your team project that 'we've got this' energy!
teamPhotoStylesFreeTour.readyContent: You're all set! Time to test with your own photo or invite the team, let's make some magic happen.

personalPhotoStylesPageTour.headingContent: A personal photo style is a preset that ensures all your photos look consistent and professional. It defines backgrounds, clothing, expressions, and branding so you can create a cohesive professional image. Create and manage your signature looks here.
personalPhotoStylesPageTour.headingContentIndividual: A personal photo style is a preset that ensures all your photos look consistent and professional. It defines backgrounds, clothing, and expressions so you can create a cohesive professional image. Create and manage your signature looks here.
personalPhotoStylesPageTour.headingContentPro: A personal photo style is a preset that ensures all your photos look consistent and professional. It defines backgrounds, clothing, expressions, and branding so you can create a cohesive professional image and brand identity. Create and manage your signature looks here.
personalPhotoStylesPageTour.createContent: Click here to craft custom photo styles that make you look like the professional you are. Backgrounds, branding, clothing - you control it all.
personalPhotoStylesPageTour.createContentIndividual: Click here to craft custom photo styles that make you look like the professional you are. Backgrounds, clothing, expressions - you control it all.
personalPhotoStylesPageTour.createContentPro: Click here to craft custom photo styles that make you look like the professional you are. Backgrounds, branding, clothing - you control it all.

personalPhotoStylesFreeTour.headingContent: A personal photo style is a preset that ensures all your photos look consistent and professional. It defines backgrounds, clothing, expressions, and branding so you can create a cohesive professional image. Even on the free plan, you get to shine consistently and professionally.
personalPhotoStylesFreeTour.headingContentIndividual: A personal photo style is a preset that ensures all your photos look consistent and professional. It defines backgrounds, clothing, and expressions so you can create a cohesive professional image. Even on the free plan, you get to shine consistently and professionally.
personalPhotoStylesFreeTour.headingContentPro: A personal photo style is a preset that ensures all your photos look consistent and professional. It defines backgrounds, clothing, expressions, and branding so you can create a cohesive professional image and brand identity. Even on the free plan, you get to shine consistently and professionally.
personalPhotoStylesFreeTour.freeContent: Use our professional "Free Package Style" to make yourself shine immediately. Upgrade anytime to create custom styles that perfectly match your brand.
personalPhotoStylesFreeTour.freeContentIndividual: Use our professional "Free Package Style" to make yourself shine immediately. Upgrade anytime to create custom styles that perfectly match your professional image.
personalPhotoStylesFreeTour.freeContentPro: Use our professional "Free Package Style" to make yourself shine immediately. Upgrade anytime to create custom styles that perfectly match your brand.
personalPhotoStylesFreeTour.backgroundContent: The background is already configured for your professional look.
personalPhotoStylesFreeTour.brandingContent: Your photos will feature the TeamShotsPro logo on clothing for consistent branding.
personalPhotoStylesFreeTour.shotTypeContent: The shot type is set to 3/4, giving you a professional, consistent framing.
personalPhotoStylesFreeTour.clothingTypeContent: The clothing style is set to business casual, ensuring you look professional yet approachable.
personalPhotoStylesFreeTour.clothingColorsContent: Here's where you shine: You can pick your own wardrobe colors while keeping everything consistent. Mix it up!
personalPhotoStylesFreeTour.expressionContent: The expression is set to confident, helping you project professionalism and assurance.
personalPhotoStylesFreeTour.readyContent: Click here to start generating your first photo.

photoStyleCreationTour.nameContent: Choose a name that captures your team's brand. Think of it as the label that keeps everyone aligned. No more mismatched LinkedIn photos.
photoStyleCreationTour.userChoiceContent: Decide if settings are locked for consistency or flexible for your team. Toggle to predefined for brand control, or user choice to let people add their touch.
photoStyleCreationTour.compositionContent: This is where you shape the photo's foundation. Set background, branding, and shot type to create a look that represents your team perfectly.
photoStyleCreationTour.backgroundContent: Pick solid colors, upload images, or describe professional scenes. It's your chance to set a backdrop that says 'professional' without saying a word.
photoStyleCreationTour.brandingContent: Add your logo to the background, clothing, or scene elements. Make your brand pop. Subtle reminders build stronger teams.
photoStyleCreationTour.shotTypeContent: Choose close-up, three-quarter, or full length. This frames how much of each person shows, keeping your team gallery balanced.
photoStyleCreationTour.userStyleContent: Control how people appear in photos. Adjust clothing, colors, expressions, and lighting to match your team's vibe.
photoStyleCreationTour.clothingContent: Select business formal, casual, or something in between. Set a standard that makes everyone look sharp. HR's secret to instant professionalism.
photoStyleCreationTour.clothingColorsContent: Describe shades like navy or blue, or pick exact colors. Allow user choice for variety, or lock it for that uniform look HR managers love.
photoStyleCreationTour.expressionContent: Opt for confident, neutral, or friendly. It's a small choice that projects big energy, perfect for team pages that inspire trust.
photoStyleCreationTour.autosaveContent: Changes save instantly. Watch for the saved indicator. Who has time for extra clicks when building a brand?

testGenerationTour.title: Generate your first photo
testGenerationTour.content: You're all set up and ready to shine. Test the process here before introducing it to your team - you'll want to see this transformation first.

inviteTeamTour.pageContent: Welcome to your {teamName} command center! Track who's joined the photo party, who's generated their pro shots (and who needs a nudge), and manage photos with ease. (Pro tip: More photos mean more smiles... or at least more headshots!)
inviteTeamTour.tableContent: Here's where the magic happens! See all your team members and pending invites in one place. Track who's joined, who's still waiting, and how many photos everyone has. It's like a mission control center, but for professional photos.
inviteTeamTour.activeStyleContent: This is the photo style your invited team members will use when generating their photos. All their photos will match this style for consistent branding across your team.
inviteTeamTour.activeStyleContentFree: Your team members will use the Free Package Style when generating photos. Upgrade to unlock custom backgrounds, branding, clothing styles, and more customization options.
inviteTeamTour.title: Invite your team
inviteTeamTour.content: Time to grow your squad! Pop in emails here and send invites faster than you can say 'cheese'. They'll get a magic link to upload selfies and generate photos ‚Äì no signup drama required.

generationDetailTour.photoContent: This is your generated professional headshot. You can see the transformation from your original selfie to this polished result.
generationDetailTour.sliderContent: Drag this slider button to reveal the selfies that were used to generate this photo. This helps you see the before and after comparison.
generationDetailTour.deleteContent: You can delete this generation if you no longer need it. This action cannot be undone, so make sure you've downloaded what you need first.
generationDetailTour.regenerateContent: You can retry this photo for free using the same settings. Each generation comes with free retries so you can perfect your results.
generationDetailTour.downloadContent: Download your professional headshot in high resolution. Perfect for LinkedIn, your website, business cards, and more.
generationDetailTour.photosContent: This shows the cost of the generation (1 photo) and how many free retries you have left. Use retries to perfect your results without spending more photos.
generationDetailTour.photosInfoContent1: No worries. You get free do-overs with every generation. Check here to see how many tries you have left.
generationDetailTour.photosInfoContent2: Love it? Download it ‚Üì. Want another shot? Retry it ‚Üª. Changed your mind? Delete it üóëÔ∏è. You're in control.
generationDetailTour.creditsInfoContent1: No worries. You get free do-overs with every generation. Check here to see how many tries you have left.
generationDetailTour.creditsInfoContent2: Love it? Download it ‚Üì. Want another shot? Retry it ‚Üª. Changed your mind? Delete it üóëÔ∏è. You're in control.
generationDetailTour.feedbackContent: Not happy with your photo? Let us know why. Your feedback helps us improve the service and technology. Especially when something isn't right, your input directly shapes better results for everyone.
generationDetailTour.manageContent: Download your photo in high resolution, retry for free using the same settings, or delete if you no longer need it. This also shows the generation cost (1 photo) and how many free retries you have left.

upgradePrompt.title: Like what you see?
upgradePrompt.description: Unlock the full power with unlimited custom styles and backgrounds.

empty.title: No personal generations yet
empty.subtitle: When you generate personal photos, your results will appear here. Ready to make some magic?

team.title: Team generations

empty.title: No team generations yet
empty.subtitle: When you or your team generate photos, your results will appear here. Teamwork makes the dream work!

team.viewOnly: View only - team member's approved work

actions.retryFailedMessage: Failed to retry image. Please try again.

deleteConfirmation.title: Hold up a second
deleteConfirmation.description: You've got {count, plural, one {# retry left} other {# retries left}} on this photo. Once you delete it, those retries disappear forever (and we don't mean 'forever' in the casual way).
deleteConfirmation.descriptionNoRetries: You're about to delete this photo. This action is permanent.
deleteConfirmation.suggestion: Not happy with it? Hit retry first. You might love what you get.
deleteConfirmation.suggestionNoRetries: Double-check you've downloaded any versions you want to keep.

toasts.generationFailed: We couldn't finish that photo. The photo credits have been returned to your balance.

upload.title: Upload a New Selfie
upload.description: Take a photo with your camera or upload an existing photo to get started.

infoBanner.selected: Green checks? You're all set. These selfies will train your AI.
infoBanner.recommendation: Pro tip: Pick at least 2 selfies with different lighting and angles.
infoBanner.recommendationDetailed: Here's the secret sauce: Choose 2+ selfies with varied lighting, angles, and poses. Throw in a full-body shot to nail the proportions. The more variety, the better your professional photos.

selectionHint.text: Select at least 2 selfies for best results.

selectionInfo.title: Select at least 2 selfies
selectionInfo.noneSelected: Take a fresh selfie or grab one from your gallery. Your call.
selectionInfo.oneSelected: You've got 1 selected. Add one more to continue.
selectionInfo.enoughSelected: You've selected {count} selfie{count, plural, =1 {} other {s}}. You can continue or select more.
selectionInfo.swipeHint: Swipe right when you're ready to customize.

gallery.deleteDisabledTooltip: This selfie is used in a generation and can't be deleted.
gallery.deleteDisabledAria: Delete disabled. This selfie is used in a generation and can't be deleted.
gallery.deleteDisabledMessage: Used in a generation and can't be deleted.

selfie.title: Choose your selfie
selfie.subtitle: Select a selfie to use for generation, or upload a new one.

typeSelection.title: How would you like to use this photo?
typeSelection.subtitle: Choose how you want to generate your professional photo.
typeSelection.helpText: You can always retry this photo later for the other use case if needed.

contexts.title: Photo styles
contexts.subtitle: A photo style is a standard that you can apply over multiple photos to maintain consistency in your professional image.
contexts.subtitleIndividual: A photo style is a standard that you can apply over multiple photos to maintain consistency in your professional image.
contexts.subtitleIndividualPlan: A photo style is a standard that you can apply over multiple photos to maintain consistency in your professional image.
contexts.subtitleProPlan: A photo style is a standard that you can apply over multiple photos to maintain consistency in your professional image and brand identity.

confirmations.deleteContext: Are you sure you want to delete this photo style?

status.mustSetActive: You must set an active photo style before inviting team members

otp.subject: Your verification code
otp.body:
Your verification code is: {code}

This code expires in 5 minutes.

magicLink.subject: Your sign-in link

teamInvite.subject: Team invitation from {teamName}
teamInvite.greetingWithName: Hi {firstName}! {inviterFirstName} invited you to get professional headshots for {teamName}.
teamInvite.photosDescription:
You can generate {photos} customizable photos. And each photo can be redone up to 4 times each. From just a selfie.

Your selfie doesn't need to be perfect. We'll handle the professional polish.
teamInvite.mobileAdvice: For the best experience, open this on your mobile device. That's where you'll take your selfie.
teamInvite.expires: This invitation expires in 24 hours. If you can't click the button, copy and paste this link in your browser:
teamInvite.questions: Questions? Just reply to this email. We're real people and we'll get back to you.

waitlistWelcome.subject: Welcome to TeamShotsPro
waitlistWelcome.title: Welcome to TeamShotsPro
waitlistWelcome.thankYou: Thanks for joining the TeamShotsPro waitlist. We're excited to have you on board as we prepare to launch professional team photography.

step1.title: We're finalizing the product
step1.description: Our team is working hard to deliver an amazing experience. We're in the final stages of development.

step2.title: You'll get early access
step2.description: As a waitlist member, you'll be among the first to try TeamShotsPro when we launch.

step3.title: Launch offer
step3.description: We'll send you a discount code when we go live. You'll save on your first professional team photos.

welcomeAfterPurchase.subject: You're in! One quick thing...
welcomeAfterPurchase.body:
Welcome aboard!

You can now generate {photos} professional photos - and you're already signed in.

One quick thing: set up a password so you can sign in again later:
{setupLink}

This link expires in 24 hours.

If you didn't make this purchase, please contact support.
welcomeAfterPurchase.heading: You're in! üéâ
welcomeAfterPurchase.intro: Welcome aboard. You're already signed in and ready to create some seriously good-looking headshots.
welcomeAfterPurchase.photosReceived: You have {photos} photos to play with
welcomeAfterPurchase.setupInstructions: One quick thing: set up a password so you can sign back in later. Future you will thank present you.
welcomeAfterPurchase.linkExpiry: This link expires in 24 hours. No pressure, but also... maybe do it now?
welcomeAfterPurchase.footer: Didn't make this purchase? That's weird. Contact us and we'll sort it out.

teaser.title: {count} more settings configured
teaser.subtitle: Customize the sections above to see what else has been set

mobile.swipeHint: Swipe or tap Next to continue

intro.title: Customize your professional headshots
intro.body: You're about to customize how your photos look. Each card controls one part of the shoot. Swipe through and adjust to match your preferences.
intro.bodyDesktop: You're about to customize how your photos look. Each section below controls a different aspect of your professional headshot.
intro.swipe: Swipe right to move forward, left to go back. You can also use the navigation buttons below.
intro.scrollDesktop: Scroll down to see all customization options. Adjust each setting to match your preferences.
intro.editable: Sparkles badge means you can edit this setting. Adjust until it matches your preferences.
intro.locked: Lock badge means your team admin set this. You can view it but not change it to maintain consistency.

selfieTips.title: Selfie tips for amazing photos
selfieTips.body: Great photos start with great selfies. Follow these tips to get the best results.

angles.title: Mix up your angles
angles.desc: Different positions help our AI understand your face better.

lighting.title: Find good lighting
lighting.desc: Natural light works best. Avoid harsh shadows on your face.

distance.title: Include one further away
distance.desc: This shows the AI your body proportions so it doesn't have to guess.

minimum.title: Upload at least 2
minimum.desc: More variety means better results. 3-5 selfies is ideal.

tooltips.predefinedToggle: Predefined locks this setting for all team members. User Choice lets each person customize it.
tooltips.background: Choose the background style for your photos. This sets the overall environment and mood.
tooltips.branding: Include your company logo in generated photos to maintain brand consistency.
tooltips.shotType: Different framings work better for different platforms. Headshots for LinkedIn, full body for team pages.
tooltips.clothing: Set the dress code for your team photos - from casual to business formal.
tooltips.clothingColors: Specify exact colors for clothing items to match your brand palette.
tooltips.expression: Control the facial expression and mood of your team photos.
tooltips.lighting: Set the lighting style to match your brand aesthetic - from natural to studio lighting.
tooltips.pose: Choose a body pose and positioning that matches your professional image and brand style.

photoStyle.comingSoon: Settings for this category coming soon

sections.customizableDesc: Personalize these settings to match your preferences
sections.presetDesc: These settings are configured by your team admin

background.subtitle: Choose your background style

addPhotosModal.title: Add photos to {name}
addPhotosModal.insufficientCredits: You only have {available} team photos available
addPhotosModal.invalidAmount: Please enter a valid number of photos

inviteForm.title: Invite team member

email.label: Email address
email.alreadyMember: This email is already a member of your team
email.pendingInvite: An invite has already been sent to this email

photos.label: Number of photos
photos.hint: Each photo can be retried up to {count} times for free
photos.tooltip: This is the number of photos they can generate with customization. Each customization can be retried up to {count} times.
photos.required: Number of photos must be greater than 0

inviteForm.insufficientCreditsModal: You need {required} photo credits but only have {available} available. Please reduce the photo allocation or purchase more photo credits.

photoStyle.label: Photo style
photoStyle.useActiveStyleDesc: Team member will use the predefined photo style: {name}
photoStyle.allowFreestyleDesc: Team member can customize their own photo style
photoStyle.useFreePackageStyleDesc: Team member will use the free package photo style. This cannot be changed for free plan accounts.

whatHappensNext.title: What happens next?
whatHappensNext.step1: Team member receives email with invite link
whatHappensNext.step3: No signup required - they can start immediately
whatHappensNext.step4: Photos generated with active photo style: {name}

adminOnly.title: Admin access required
adminOnly.message: This page is only accessible to company administrators.

setup.title: Create your team profile
setup.subtitle: Before you can manage your team, please set up your team details.

welcomePopup.title: You're all set
welcomePopup.message: You're just moments away from professional team photos that make everyone shine. Start by giving your team a name. Make it epic! üöÄ

selfieApproval.title: Review your selfie
selfieApproval.disclaimer: By approving, you confirm you have the rights to use this photo and consent to its use for photo generation.

errors.internalServerError: Oops! Something went wrong on our end. We've been notified and are working on it. Please try again in a moment.

teamInvites.userNotInTeam: Looks like you're not part of a team yet. Ask your team admin to send you an invite.
teamInvites.noActiveContext: You need to create and set an active photo style before inviting team members. Set it up first, then come back!
teamInvites.invalidCreditAllocation: Photos must be allocated in multiples of {credits} credits (the cost per photo generation). For example: {credits2} credits ({credits} credits √ó 2), {credits3} credits ({credits} credits √ó 3), etc.
teamInvites.teamSizeLimitReached: Your Pro Small plan allows up to {limit} team members. Upgrade to Pro Large for unlimited team members.

modal.title: Share your feedback
modal.description: Help us improve TeamShots by sharing your thoughts

form.category: What type of feedback is this?
form.rating: How would you rate your experience?
form.emailRequired: Email is required for anonymous feedback

generation.helpImprove: We need this to improve the quality of the pics
generation.feedbackRequired: Please select at least one issue or provide a comment

feedback.error: Failed to submit feedback. Please try again.

quickAccess.title: Quick access
quickAccess.analyticsDesc: View conversion rates, ARPU, and user metrics

tools.roleManagementDesc: This section is only visible to platform administrators. Use with caution for testing purposes.
tools.roleChangeWarning: This will change your role immediately. Use for testing only.
tools.refreshSessionHint: Refresh your session to see updated role information.
tools.sessionMismatch: Session mismatch detected! Database: {dbRole}, Session: {sessionRole}. Please sign out using the profile menu in the sidebar and sign back in.
tools.sessionUpToDate: Session is up to date. Database role: {role}
tools.onlyAdminsCanChangeRoles: Only platform administrators can change roles
tools.roleChanged: Role changed to {role}. Please sign out and sign back in to see the changes.

impersonation.title: User impersonation
impersonation.description: Impersonate a user to see the application from their perspective. All actions will be logged.
impersonation.warning: You cannot impersonate other platform administrators.
impersonation.currentlyImpersonating: You are currently impersonating a user. All actions will be logged and attributed to the impersonated user.

roles.teamSetupHint: You're a team admin but haven't set up a team yet.

insufficientCredits.title: Insufficient credits
insufficientCredits.messageWithName: You don't have enough credits to generate photos. Please contact {adminName} ({adminEmail}) to request more credits.
insufficientCredits.messageWithEmail: You don't have enough credits to generate photos. Please contact your team admin at {adminEmail} to request more credits.
insufficientCredits.messageGeneric: You don't have enough credits to generate photos. Please contact your team admin to request more credits.

expired.title: New invite sent
expired.securityMessage: We automatically sent you a fresh invite link because the old one expired. This keeps your team's data secure: expired links can't be used by anyone who might have stumbled upon them. Your new link is valid for 24 hours.
expired.checkInbox: Check your inbox for the new invite link.

alerts.selectAtLeastTwoSelfies: Please select at least 2 selfies to continue.
alerts.insufficientCreditsWithName: You don't have enough credits to generate photos. Please contact {adminName} ({adminEmail}) to request more credits.
alerts.customizePhoto: Please customize your photo settings before generating
alerts.insufficientCreditsWithEmail: You don't have enough credits to generate photos. Please contact your team admin at {adminEmail} to request more credits.
alerts.insufficientCreditsGeneric: You don't have enough credits to generate photos. Please contact your team admin to request more credits.
alerts.generationFailed: Failed to start generation. Please try again.

getStarted.title: Get started
getStarted.description: We'll guide you through uploading your selfie and generating your team photo.

recentPhotos.title: Recent photos
recentPhotos.empty: No photos yet. Generate one and they'll show up here.

mobile.bannerMessage: Choose at least 2 selfies, then swipe right when you're ready to customize.
mobile.hint: Need to tweak selfies again? Adjust them here, then swipe right to keep going.

customizeHint.message: Customize your photo in the editable sections below before generating.

selfieTips.swipeHint: Swipe left to select your selfies

permissionNeeded.title: Camera access needed
permissionNeeded.description: To take a selfie, please allow camera access in your browser.
permissionNeeded.step1: Tap the camera/lock icon in your browser address bar

noSelfies.title: No selfies uploaded yet
noSelfies.description: Upload a selfie first to generate team photos.

signUpCta.title: Want to create personal photos too?
